ReportSection.name: Annual Report
ReportSection.title: Annual Report
ReportSection.Static:
Period: {time2date({$start_date}, F Y)} to {time2date({$end_date}, F Y)}

A staff member is required to submit an annual report covering the staff member's activities during the previous year; see Faculty Agreement or FSO Agreement. The information submitted will be used in arriving at decisions regarding salaries, tenure, and promotion.

Note: All data you manually enter in your Annual Report will only be used to inform the FEC process. Data imported from institutional and external databases, i.e., course teaching, grants, and publications, may be used for analytics purposes.

Name:{$user_first_name} {$user_last_name}
Position:{$user_level}
Department:{$user_dept}
P.Eng. Status:{getText(RP_FEC,PENG_STATUS,PENG_STATUS,0,{$user_id},0,0)}{if("{getText(RP_FEC,PENG_STATUS,PENG_STATUS,0,{$user_id},0,0,true)}" == "P.Eng.",  ({getText(RP_FEC,PENG_STATUS,PENG_STATUS_OTHER,0,{$user_id},0,0)}))}
{if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfPhd)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfAppointment)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfAssistant)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfAssociate)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfProfessor)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateFso2)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateFso3)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateFso4)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateAtsec1)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateAtsec2)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateAtsec3)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfProbation1)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfProbation2)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfTenure)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfRetirement)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(dateOfLastDegree)}" != "", )} {if("{getFecPersonalInfo(lastDegree)}" != "", )}

ReportSection.name: Teaching
ReportSection.title: 1. TEACHING
ReportSection.Static:
Manage Teaching Note: If you are currently teaching 13-week Spring/Summer courses, these courses and their associated SPOT data will be reported in your Annual Report next year. If you taught Spring/Summer courses in 2023, they were reported on last yearâ€™s annual report.
Core course data has been imported, including course title and number, calendar hours, and actual number of students.
In addition, please provide
  1. the names of all instructors involved and their corresponding percentage of course instruction; and
  2. your actual weekly average hours of contact (indicate if a reading course).
For multi-section courses, please indicate the course coordinator with an asterisk (*).

ReportItemSet.Static:
{$course_subject} {$course_number} - {$course_title}

percentage of course instruction		 Calendar
Hours		 Your Actual Weekly
Average Contact Hours
(indicate if a reading course)		 Actual
Number of
Students

Project Courses

ReportSection.name: Educational Initiatives
ReportSection.title: 2. EDUCATIONAL INITIATIVES

ReportItem.labels: Course Number|Description and Educational Objective|Hours Invested|Method Used to Evaluate Initiative

ReportSection.ReportItem:
(a) Please briefly describe initiatives taken to improve your own teaching:

New teaching methods implemented: {$item}

ReportItem.labels: Course Number|Description and Educational Objective|Hours Invested|Method Used to Evaluate Initiative

ReportSection.ReportItem:
(b) Please briefly describe initiatives taken to improve teaching (beyond your own) within the Faculty, at the University of Alberta, and externally:

This may include informal peer mentoring, formal peer consultations (as the consultant), participation in teaching triads, leadership of education related workshops, and participation as a discussant in panel discussions.

{$item}

(c) Describe any activities and initiatives taken to enhance graduate student supervision and mentoring:

{$item}

(d) List any engineering education-related scholarship activities:

Outputs (e.g., publications, presentations) should be reported in Section 5(g). {$item}

ReportSection.name: Research
ReportSection.title: 4. RESEARCH
ReportSection.Static:
Manage Funding

(a) Research Area:

This information, i.e., research area, keywords and P.Eng status, can be edited on your profile tab.

(i) Major Area: {getText(RP_FEC,RESEARCH_AREA,RESEARCH_AREA,0,{$user_id},0,0)}{if({contains({getText(RP_FEC,RESEARCH_AREA,RESEARCH_AREA,0,{$user_id},0,0,true)}, Other)}, : {getText(RP_FEC,RESEARCH_AREA,RESEARCH_AREA_OTHER,0,{$user_id},0,0)})}

(ii) Keywords: {$user_keywords}

(b) Grants Awarded:

(Individual, operating, equipment, and share of other grants. For shared grants, indicate if you are the Principal Investigator (The Principal Investigator is the holder and signing authority of the grant account). Indicate if a grant is not being administered through the Faculty of Engineering, and, if not, state where it is being administered by adding a footnote. Do not list internal university startup funds, AIF or other graduate scholarships listed in section 3. Also, do not list unsuccessful applications and/or grants applied for but not yet awarded. List start and finish date (e.g., NSERC (Discovery), April 2008 - March 2012).

Granting Body Start Date End Date Average
Amount/Year		 Total Award Title P.I.
(y/n)		 Joint With Footnotes

ReportSection.name: Scholarly Publications
ReportSection.title: 5. SCHOLARLY PUBLICATIONS AND CONTRIBUTIONS
ReportSection.Static:
Manage Outputs

Do not include articles submitted but not yet accepted. Copies of publications or manuscript may be requested by the Department Chair, including letter of acceptance for articles in press.

italic = PDF/research associate; bold = graduate student; underline = undergraduate student; light grey/underline = the AR owner; light grey = other UofA faculty member

ReportSection.title: 10. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

{$item}

ReportSection.name: SPOTs
ReportSection.title: APPENDIX A: SPOTs
ReportSection.Static: SPOT data for the Spring {$this_year} term will be imported and included in your Annual Report as soon as it becomes available, potentially as late as the latter half of June. If you are teaching during the Spring {$this_year} term, you should revisit and update your reflections on teaching after this data has been imported and only "submit and lock" your Annual Report after you have done so. If you are currently teaching 13-week Spring/Summer courses, these courses and their associated SPOT data will be reported in your Annual Report next year. If you are not teaching during Spring {$this_year}, you can "submit and lock" your Annual Report as soon as you are done.

ReportSection.name: Attachments
ReportSection.title: APPENDIX D: OTHER ATTACHMENTS
ReportSection.Static: Uploaded documents will be appended at the end of the submitted annual report pdf

<button id='addFile' type='button' class='pdfnodisplay' style='margin-top:1em;'>Add another file</button>
                <script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('#addFile').click(function(){
                        $('.files:not(:visible)').first().show();
                        $('iframe', $('.files:visible').last())[0].src = $('iframe', $('.files:visible').last())[0].src;
                        if($('.files:not(:visible)').length == 0){
                            $('#addFile').prop('disabled', true);
                        }
                    });
                </script>

ReportSection.name: Review
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Preview

The following is just a preview of what the PDF will look like, the generated PDF may appear differently so make sure to look it over after generating it.

{$item}

ReportSection.tooltip: PDF generation and submission to the FEC
ReportSection.name: Sign & Lock
ReportSection.If: Note: This report cannot be submitted while impersonating.

Else.ReportItem:
Once you are satisfied with the generated PDF, you can lock your annual report.

NOTE: If you have recently made changes to your report, you will need to generate a new pdf on the Review section
NOTE: You will be unable to make further changes after locking your annual report.

{$item}
